rows.label: qst720601_msg0001
rows.name: Hello there, Montos.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0002
rows.name:
Prince Adel! And your companions
by your side.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0003
rows.name:
If I may boldly guess, were you so kind
as to come here in order to obtain
some desert-traversing preparation?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0004
rows.name:
Bang on the mark. Here's enough
Tawny Carrots and Nest Extract for
several people's share of remedies.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, very good! It never hurts to be
well-provisioned. You've no idea how
touched I am...

rows.label: qst720601_msg0006
rows.name:
This gladdens not only my heart, but
those of the resistance, and the people
of Aletta!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0007
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0008
rows.name:
Looks like you've finally found it
within you to bear the burdens of
Iira, Your Majesty! Wonderful!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0009
rows.name:
Er, sorry Montos, I'm not sure
I follow you.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0010
rows.name:
To think this day would finally come...
The long years I've spent waiting for
Your Majesty to ascend the throne!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0011
rows.name:
Adel... You aren't thinking of doing
anything like that are you?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0012
rows.name:
No! The thought never even crossed
my mind!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0013
rows.name: Where's all this coming from, Montos?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0014
rows.name:
Hmmm... Yes, His Majesty the King has
a kind heart, no doubt about it... A little
too kind, at times, to do what he must...

rows.label: qst720601_msg0015
rows.name:
I feel that many of his subjects long for
decisive and resolute leadership...such
as the Prince could offer.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0016
rows.name:
Prince Adel... If only I could lay
claim to such irresistible charisma!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0017
rows.name:
Your Imperial Majesty! What a thing to
say!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0018
rows.name:
Prince Adel possesses great virtue,
but I must humbly assert that Your
Majesty has at least an equal portion!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0019
rows.name:
I concur with Wadatsumi,
Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0020
rows.name:
I really think you're making too much of
this charisma of mine. Anyway, I could
never usurp a lawful ruler or bloodline.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0021
rows.name:
I want to go to the royal capital, but
only to protect Iira, not to take it
over.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0022
rows.name:
Really? Well, that's a terrible shame,
if you ask me, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't know if you were serious or
not there, Montos. But either way, that
kind of talk is unwise to say the least.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0024
rows.name:
Prince Zettar is notoriously insecure.
If he heard something like that, things
could get pretty interesting.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0025
rows.name: "Interesting"? It's all right for some.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0026
rows.name:
Hah. Anything's interesting when you
can just sit back and watch from the
sidelines!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0027
rows.name:
Well, I was certainly moved by your
declaration of loyalty, Your Majesty.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0028
rows.name:
I promise to be a little more discreet
about my hopes for you to ascend the
throne from now on.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0029
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Then you can stop addressing me
as "Your Majesty"!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0030
rows.name:
Well then, my good apothecary. For
how much can we acquire your fine
desert medicine?

rows.label: qst720601_msg0031
rows.name:
Ah, yes! The purpose of your visit...
Forgive me, I got a little side-tracked
there...

rows.label: qst720601_msg0032
rows.name:
I'll just take the ingredients
and combine them, post haste!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0033
rows.name:
...There we are!
Desert medicine for five!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0034
rows.name: Thank you, Montos.

rows.label: qst720601_msg0035
rows.name:
All right, then. Now at last, we can
finally cross Lett Bridge and make
for the capital!

rows.label: qst720601_msg0036
rows.name:
I'll pray for the safety of your journey,
Your Majesty!
